markdown:
In this club, the membership structure includes various categories with specific initiation fees, transfer scenarios, age requirements, member limits, and special conditions. Memberships become active upon payment receipt, and new members must attend an orientation within two weeks of payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

I. MEMBERSHIP CATEGORIES & INITIATION FEES
- New members must pay an initiation fee.
- Foundation Transfer to a Child: Transfer fee equals the current Foundation (Legacy) Membership initiation fee plus taxes [Doc:1#Chunk:1].
- Transfer to Surviving Spouse Upon Death: Surviving spouse can request transfer to surviving spouse status [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

II. TRANSFER FEES & SCENARIOS
- Foundation Transfer to a Child incurs a transfer fee equal to the Foundation Membership initiation fee [Doc:1#Chunk:1].
- Surviving spouse of a Foundation, Golfing Senior, Social, or Social Former Foundation Member can request transfer to surviving spouse status [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

III. REINSTATEMENT PROVISIONS
- No specific details provided in the sources.

IV. PAYMENT & BILLING REQUIREMENTS
- Membership becomes active upon payment receipt [Doc:1#Chunk:1].
- New members must attend an orientation within two weeks of payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

V. AGE-BASED PROVISIONS & RESTRICTIONS
- No specific age requirements mentioned in the sources.

VI. SPECIAL PROGRAMS & PROVISIONS
- Surviving spouses of specific member categories can request transfer to surviving spouse status [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

VII. ADDITIONAL FEES & REQUIREMENTS
- No additional fees or requirements specified in the sources.
